title: Elvis Presley's motto, "TCB"-- what font?
content:
I am wondering what font the "TCB" in Elvis' logo is. Anyone?

[http://www.allposters.com/-sp/Elvis-TCB-Posters\_i2843601\_.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20111028175401/http:/www.allposters.com/-sp/Elvis-TCB-Posters_i2843601_.htm "http://www.allposters.com/-sp/Elvis-TCB-Posters\_i2843601\_.htm")
author: jillenium

comments.content: The link sez "Sorry, we no longer sell that poster. You can continue to search using the search box above or the categories to your left."

Hmm, strange Yves, I see it and it looks like a sort of hand rendered or screenprint affected [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20111028175401/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/futura_std_bold/?sample_text=TCB&sample_size=74).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111028175401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ELV-165-AT~Elvis-TCB-Posters_5282.jpg)
